ch0140_10_sakaki/0101_0701_01_10:
Are you the one they sent over? Excuse me,
my mistake.
ch0140_10_sakaki/0101_0701_02_10:
Have you taken an interest in my ways? That’s
fine by me.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7101_0701_01_10:
Pokémon can lend their strength to humans. This
we can both agree on.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7101_0701_02_10:
However, I use Pokémon for my personal gain. I
turn them into money and power.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7101_0701_03_10: We simply differ in our methods.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7102_0701_01_10: I like hats. I use them to hide my face.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7102_0701_02_10:
There’s nothing more handy when you want to
work in the shadows.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7103_0701_01_10:
Whether it’s big or small, everyone harbors some
evil within their hearts.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7103_0701_02_10:
If you ever become disillusioned by the righteous
path, you can come knock on Team Rocket’s
door anytime.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7103_0701_03_10:
We’ll welcome you when that time
comes. *chuckle*
ch0140_10_sakaki/7104_0701_01_10:
Soon, Team Rocket will have everything within
its grasp.
ch0140_10_sakaki/7104_0701_02_10:
Our reach will extend any distance...even into
other worlds!
ch0140_10_sakaki/7105_0701_01_10:
I see that you raise Pokémon with utmost
care, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0140_10_sakaki/7105_0701_02_10: If you want to protect your dear Pokémon...
ch0140_10_sakaki/7105_0701_03_10:
you’ll need to be strong. No matter what
that takes.
ch0140_10_sakaki/1701_0701_01_10: I’m not sure if you’ll like it, but take this.
ch0140_10_sakaki/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to be suspicious. I have no ulterior
motives. *chuckle*
ch0140_10_sakaki/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been raising Nidoking since my time in Kanto.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2501_0701_02_10: Do I have an attachment to him? Perhaps I do.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2501_0702_01_10:
What’s that? What would I do if I had to give up
Nidoking for the sake of a scheme?
ch0140_10_sakaki/2501_0702_02_10:
Fwahahahaha! You aren’t afraid to speak your
mind, are you.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2501_0702_03_10: I don’t have an answer for that.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2501_0702_04_10:
It would all depend on the specifics of the
situation. That is how an organization works,
after all.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2511_0701_01_10:
The true nature of those bonds and friendships you
hold so dearly...
ch0140_10_sakaki/2511_0701_02_10: I will uncover its mysteries and use it for evil!
ch0140_10_sakaki/2511_0701_03_10:
The power of the heart isn’t reserved for
the righteous.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2511_0702_01_10:
Good and evil are two sides of the same coin.
Good taken too far will inevitably become evil.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2511_0702_02_10:
One day, you may find yourself standing opposite
of where you started.
ch0140_10_sakaki/2511_0702_03_10:
The day that I am seen as “good” is sure to
come as well.
ch0140_10_sakaki/3001_0701_01_10:
You may think you’re safe in the morning, but you
never know who might already be setting their
plans in motion.
ch0140_10_sakaki/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m heading out for some training. You can follow
me, if you don’t believe that.
ch0140_10_sakaki/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s always much more convenient to work at
night... For conducting matters of business,
of course.
